articles.title: Singapore's Temasek taps brakes on new Chinese tech investments--report - Seeking Alpha
articles.description: Singapore's Temasek will hold off on making new investments in Chinese tech companies because of uncertainty over Beijing's efforts to exert more control over the sector.
